data.name: Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack
data.detailed_description: Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack - 8 powerful explosives-packed blaster charges, each featuring 4 multi-effect octopus rockets, gives you a total of 32 spectacular blasts that will turn into an unmatched fiery extravaganza for everyone to enjoy! The length of the Squid-pro-Quo Blaster show is around _ seconds! Blast ‘em away by yourself or give the Pack as present to a friend - that’s entirely up to you!
data.about_the_game: Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack - 8 powerful explosives-packed blaster charges, each featuring 4 multi-effect octopus rockets, gives you a total of 32 spectacular blasts that will turn into an unmatched fiery extravaganza for everyone to enjoy! The length of the Squid-pro-Quo Blaster show is around _ seconds! Blast ‘em away by yourself or give the Pack as present to a friend - that’s entirely up to you!
data.short_description: Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack - 8 powerful explosives-packed blaster charges, each featuring 4 multi-effect octopus rockets, gives you a total of 32 spectacular blasts that will turn into an unmatched fiery extravaganza for everyone to enjoy! The length of the Squid-pro-Quo Blaster show is around _ seconds! Blast ‘em away by yourself or give the Pack as present to a friend - that’s entirely up to you!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil, Spanish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
